trans-unit.source: Provides a common implementation of members for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação comum de membros para as classes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class provides implementations of common elements for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> classe fornece implementações de elementos comuns para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controles.

trans-unit.source: The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes propriedades são de interesse principal para os usuários de uma associação de dados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class as implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir é um aplicativo completo que mostra como você pode usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> membros a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> classe conforme implementado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> classe.

trans-unit.source: The example loads an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and the list box.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo carrega um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> e a caixa de listagem.

trans-unit.source: When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário seleciona um item na caixa de listagem, o valor selecionado é usado para retornar os dados associados ao item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list enables selection of list items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a lista habilita a seleção de itens da lista.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list enables list item selection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a lista permite que a seleção de item de lista. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> associado a esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> associado a esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataManager%2A> property is valid if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataManager%2A> propriedade é válida se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> está definida.

trans-unit.source: If this is not a data-bound control, the default is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se isso não é um controle associado a dados, o padrão é `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte de dados deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> interfaces, such as a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> or an <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa as interfaces <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> ou <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" />, como um <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Array" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras para preencher o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controles.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode adicionar objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can also add objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode adicionar objetos a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> propriedades para preencher o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> estiver definida, um usuário não é possível modificar a coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: If setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property causes the data source to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se a configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> propriedade faz com que a fonte de dados alterar, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If setting this property causes the data member to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se a definição dessa propriedade faz com que o membro de dados alterar, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> to `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Quando você define <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> para `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> é definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to display for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade a ser exibida para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> specifying the name of an object property that is contained in the collection specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que especifica o nome de uma propriedade de objeto contida na coleção especificada pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> can display diverse types of objects.
trans-unit.target: Os controles que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> pode exibir vários tipos de objetos.

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade especificada não existe no objeto ou o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), os resultados do objeto `ToString` método são exibidas em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained.
trans-unit.target: Se o novo membro de exibição não pode ser definido, o membro de exibição anterior configuração é mantido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item, if the item is a property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o valor atual do item <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> se o item é uma propriedade de uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The object the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item is bound to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ao qual o item <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item, if it is a property of an object, given the item.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o valor atual do item <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> se for uma propriedade de um objeto, dado o item.

trans-unit.source: The filtered object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filtrado.

trans-unit.source: The object the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item is bound to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ao qual o item <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> está associado.

trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade do item ao qual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item, if it is a property of an object given the item and the property name.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor atual do item <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> se ele é uma propriedade de um objeto, dado o item e o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The filtered object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filtrado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is bound to a data value.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é associado a um valor de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> event is raised before each visible item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> is formatted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> é gerado antes de cada item visível a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> é formatado.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Manipulação deste evento, você terá acesso à cadeia de caracteres a ser exibido para este item de lista, por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether formatting is applied to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a formatação é aplicada à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if formatting of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a formatação da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> estiver habilitada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> property to `true` causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> event to be raised for each visible member of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> propriedade `true` faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> evento ser gerado para cada membro visível do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> are related as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> são relacionadas da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> é `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> não será definido como-1 quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> está em branco.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> será definido como-1 quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> está em branco.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: The object from which to get the contents to display.
trans-unit.target: O objeto do qual obter o conteúdo a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the text representation of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação de texto do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property is not specified, the value returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.GetItemText(System.Object)" /> is the value of the item's <see langword="ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> não for especificada, o valor retornado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.GetItemText(System.Object)" /> será o valor do método <see langword="ToString" /> do item.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method returns the string value of the member specified in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property for the object specified in the <paramref name="item" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o método retornará o valor de cadeia de caracteres do membro especificado na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> do objeto especificado no parâmetro <paramref name="item" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />.

trans-unit.source: Handles special input keys, such as PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, HOME, END, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia chaves especiais de entrada como PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, HOME, END e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter specifies the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.End" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Home" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.PageUp" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.PageDown" /> key; <see langword="false" /> if the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter specifies <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Alt" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o parâmetro <paramref name="keyData" /> especifica a chave <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.End" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Home" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.PageUp" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.PageDown" />; <see langword="false" /> se o parâmetro <paramref name="keyData" /> especifica <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Alt" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item whose data to refresh.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do item cujos dados devem ser atualizados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the data of the object at the specified index with the contents of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, ressincroniza os dados do objeto no índice especificado com o conteúdo da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the item data with the contents of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, ressincroniza os dados do item com o conteúdo da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define o índice de base zero do item atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do item selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de um negativo (-1) é retornado se nenhum item é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the member property specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade do membro especificado pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" />.

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the member of the data source specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém o valor do membro da fonte de dados especificada pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" />.

trans-unit.source: If a property is not specified in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade não for especificada em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> retorna os resultados de `ToString` método do objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> are related as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> são relacionadas da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> é `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> não será definido como-1 quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> está em branco.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> será definido como-1 quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> está em branco.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class as implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class.

trans-unit.source: The example loads an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and the list box.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo carrega um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> e a caixa de listagem.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> event to fill in a text box when the user selects an item in the list box.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> evento para preencher uma caixa de texto quando o usuário seleciona um item na caixa de listagem.

trans-unit.source: The text box is filled with the data associated with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: A caixa de texto é preenchida com os dados associados ao item selecionado.

trans-unit.target: O índice de matriz do objeto.

trans-unit.target: O objeto.

trans-unit.source: An array of items.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de itens.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the property to use as the actual value for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho da propriedade a ser usada como o valor real dos itens no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing a single property name of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" /> property value, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to a property name of the final data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa um único nome de propriedade do valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" /> ou uma hierarquia de nomes de propriedade separados por pontos, que é resolvida como um nome de propriedade do objeto com associação de dados final.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Specify the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property in cases where you bind data.
trans-unit.target: Especifique o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> propriedade nos casos em que você pode associar dados.

trans-unit.source: You can clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode limpar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> propriedade, definindo a propriedade como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") ou `null`.

trans-unit.source: Setting a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Definindo um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância de um tipo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `ListControl1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> evento.
